trans-unit.source: Provides mappings between code entities in .NET Framework Web service methods and the content of Web Services Description Language (WSDL) messages that are defined for SOAP Web services.
trans-unit.target: 提供 SOAP Web 服务的.NET Framework Web 服务方法中的代码实体和定义的 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 消息的内容之间的映射。

trans-unit.source: The XmlReflectionMember class is not used directly.
trans-unit.target: XmlReflectionMember 类不直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is used: - To initialize <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> objects while the .NET Framework is initializing a SOAP Web service or client.
trans-unit.target: 相反，使用:-若要初始化<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>对象时.NET Framework 正在初始化 SOAP Web 服务或客户端。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: - By the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class while <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> creates <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects from classes that are identified as SOAP Web services.
trans-unit.target: -通过<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>类在时<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>创建<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>从标识为 SOAP Web 服务的类的对象。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>

trans-unit.source: During reflection of a SOAP Web service method, arrays of XmlReflectionMember objects are produced that represent the contents of WSDL message definitions.
trans-unit.target: 期间的 SOAP Web 服务方法的反射，XmlReflectionMember 对象的数组会产生表示 WSDL 消息定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: An array is produced for each of the following items that belong to a SOAP Web service method: - Input parameters.
trans-unit.target: 数组生成为每个属于 SOAP Web 服务方法的以下项:-输入参数。

trans-unit.source: - Output parameters and return values.
trans-unit.target: 的输出参数和返回值。

trans-unit.source: - Request SOAP headers via attributes.
trans-unit.target: -请求通过属性的 SOAP 标头。

trans-unit.source: - Response SOAP headers via attributes.
trans-unit.target: -通过属性响应 SOAP 标头。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionImporter> classes translate an XmlReflectionMember array into an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> that contains an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping> collection, for further processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>和<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionImporter>类转换到 XmlReflectionMember 数组<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>包含<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping>集合，以做进一步处理。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember"></xref> represents a Web service method return value, as opposed to an output parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember"></xref>表示 Web 服务方法返回的值，而不是输出参数。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 不需要使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>类并将其属性直接。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the member represents a Web service return value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成员表示 Web 服务返回的值;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the Web service method member for this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务方法成员为此映射的名称。

trans-unit.source: The Web service method member may be an input parameter, an output parameter, a return type, an input header, or an output header.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务方法成员可能是输入的参数、 输出参数、 返回类型、 一个输入的标头或一个输出标头。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 不需要使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>类并将其属性直接。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> class for the cases when a member corresponds to a `<part>` element defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>类情况下，当成员对应于`<part>`在 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中定义的元素。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that with a wrapped binding between a WSDL operation and a .NET Framework method (indicated by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle> enumeration member), the method parameters and return value do not appear in the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 但请注意，使用 WSDL 操作与.NET Framework 方法之间的已包装绑定 (由<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle>枚举成员)，方法参数和返回值未出现的 WSDL 文档中。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle>

trans-unit.source: When a Web service method is being reflected, the return type's MemberName property becomes the method name (made unique from other member names, if necessary) with "Result" appended.
trans-unit.target: 当被反射 Web 服务方法时，返回类型的成员名称属性将成为 （使其不同于其他成员名称，如有必要） 的方法名称追加了"Result"。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the Web service method member code entity that is represented by this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示通过此映射的 Web 服务方法成员代码实体的类型。

trans-unit.source: The Web service method member's code entity may be an input parameter, an output parameter, a return type, or a SOAP header attribute.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务方法成员代码实体可能是输入的参数、 输出参数、 返回类型或 SOAP 标头属性。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 不需要使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>类并将其属性直接。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> class for the cases when a member corresponds to a part element defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>在成员对应于在 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中定义的一部分元素的情况下的类。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that with a wrapped binding between a WSDL operation and a .NET Framework method (indicated by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle> enumeration member), the method parameters and return value do not appear in the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 但请注意，使用 WSDL 操作与.NET Framework 方法之间的已包装绑定 (由<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle>枚举成员)，方法参数和返回值未出现的 WSDL 文档中。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the Web service method member code entity that is represented by this mapping.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>表示通过此映射的 Web 服务方法成员代码实体。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the value of the corresponding XML element definition's `isNullable` attribute is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示的值的相应的 XML 元素定义的`isNullable`属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This setting overrides the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此设置将替代<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>属性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is set to `true` only when a SOAP header's type is neither <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> nor <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapUnknownHeader>.
trans-unit.target: 设置为`true`SOAP 标头的类型时才既不<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>也<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapUnknownHeader>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapUnknownHeader> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 不需要使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>类并将其属性直接。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to override the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable*> property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>若要重写<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable*>属性; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> with the collection of SOAP-related attributes that have been applied to the member code entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref>使用与 SOAP 相关的属性已应用于成员代码实体的集合。

trans-unit.source: The Web service method member's code entity may be an input parameter, an output parameter, a return type, an input SOAP header attribute, or an output SOAP header attribute.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务方法成员代码实体可能是输入的参数、 输出参数、 返回类型、 输入的 SOAP 标头属性或输出 SOAP 标头属性。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 不需要使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>类并将其属性直接。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that contains the objects that represent SOAP attributes applied to the member.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> ，包含表示 SOAP 特性应用于的成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> with the collection of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>-related attributes that have been applied to the member code entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>使用的集合<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>-相关已应用于成员代码实体的属性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The Web service method member's code entity may be an input parameter, an output parameter, a return type, an input SOAP header attribute, or an output SOAP header attribute.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务方法成员代码实体可能是输入的参数、 输出参数、 返回类型、 输入的 SOAP 标头属性或输出 SOAP 标头属性。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 不需要使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>类并将其属性直接。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> that represents XML attributes that have been applied to the member code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>表示已应用于该成员代码的 XML 属性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>
